content: Thank you so much Sherry. I am truly blessed to have you as an ally. They say it takes a village and I’’ll be damned, it does!! I will say growing up in public sucks, but is so worth it if it means even one other person is affected enough by my words to choose an alternate path instead of a path as painful as mine has been. Thank you so much for all of your love and support.💜💜Jenn💜💜
